entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then south 40 gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
